full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, ,RGYAL MDOS KYI CHO GA NGO MTSAR SGYU MA'I MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @032B SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RGYAL GDON DANG, ,DKOR 'DRE'I GNOD PA CHES MANG BAR, ,RGYAL MDOS BTANG NA PHAN NO ZHES, ,MCHOG DMAN DU MAS LAG LEN BYED, ,'ON KYANG SBYOR DNGOS RJES TSANG BA'I, ,CHO GA 'KHYER BDE DPYAD BZOD PA, ,MED PHYIR KHYOD KYIS BSGRIGS @033A *, ,SHIG CES, ,DU MAS NAN TU BSKUL BA NA, ,MDOS KYI CHO GA'I RNAM BZHAG NI, ,RIGS PAS SGRUB PAR MI NUS SHING, ,BKA' BSTAN GZHUNG LUGS CHE RNAMS KYANG, ,'DI YI DBANG POR 'OS MA YIN, ,SHES NA MDOS GZHUNG RANG LUGS KYI, ,RNAM BZHAG 'GROS SHIG YOD SRID KYANG, ,KHO BO PHYOGS DER MA SBYANGS PAS, ,MUN NAG 'DOM 'JAL LTA BUR GYUR, ,'ON KYANG SA LA RNAM BZHAG DANG, ,BLANG DOR STON PA'I GZHUNG MIN PHYIR, ,CUNG ZAD 'KHRUL KYANG NYES PA NI, ,CHUNG NGAM SNYAM PA'I SNYING KHAM GYIS, ,GRONG CHOG MKHAN 'GA'I DPE HRUL LA, ,SLOB DPON BCOL TE GA-YAR KHRAL DU, ,MDOS CHOS SGYU MA'I MCHOD SBYIN 'DI, ,^DHARMA BADZRA ZHES BYAS SPROS, ,RGYAL PO BCUN GZIR GNAD DBAB DANG, ,ZA KHA DGRA LA STON PA SOGS, ,MDE'U SBYAR 'OS 'GA' @033B ZHIG NI, ,SKABS SU BABS NA SLANG NAS 'GOD, ,'DI LA 'PHYONG RNAMS GDAGS 'DOD NA, ,SNANG SRID SIL BU SOGS NAS BLANG, ,RTA MGRIN BDAG MDUN BZLOG PA DANG, ,'BREL BAR BYED NA CHOS SKOR GYI, ,BDUD LAS RGYAL BA'I RGYAL MTSAN LTAR, ,MDOS CHOG MTSAMS SU BCUG PAS CHOG ,AA PHA'I PHOR NAG GTZANG ZHEN CAN, ,'GA' ZHIG 'DI LA MI MOS NA, ,SNGON GYI DPE RNYING SER KOG MA, ,DA NUNG ZAD ZAD BAR DU KLOG ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BA'I RIG SNGAGS KYIS, ,RNAM RTOG GA-YAB MOS BOS PA'I GDON, ,BDEN MED SGYU MA'I GRONG KHYER DU, ,BSKRAD NAS GNOD 'TSE KUN BRAL SHOG , ,,SVA STI, TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR DE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,
